name: pheasant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large bird with a rounded body and long tail, that spends a lot of time on the ground and is often shot for sport and food, or the meat of this bird: He shot a pheasant. roast pheasant
itsabreeze photography/ Moment/GettyImages
